data.title: Disappointing!
data.text:
Parking: Off street. Hard to find due to avenue being very busy.
Environment: Comfortable, quiet, and clean.
Service: Confused, not bringing tableware before food, forgetting things.
Portions: Good sized portion of rice with pork and sweet plantains enough for two.
Food: rice was very oily/no flavor, chicken wings hardly had meat/mostly all bones, alcapurrias had enough meat/well cooked but weird color/taste, bacalaitos (cod fish fritters) were overcooked/not much taste/no cod fish pieces whatsoever, pernil (pork) was well cooked/flavorful/good size portion, maduros (sweet plantains) were really sweet but so soft it looked like baby food, rellenos (potato ball) had no color at all/no flavor/hardly meat, salad was fresh/good sized portion/no choice of dressing, fruit juice was flavorful, refreshing, and best item bought/enjoyed in this restaurant.
